name: T. Raumschmiere
description: '''Marco Haas''' (born 1975) is a German [[Punk ideology|punk]]/[[Techno music|techno]] DJ known by the stage name '''T.Raumschmiere'''. He has released two albums of aggressive [[electropop]] and has worked with [[Miss Kittin]] and [[Ellen Allien]], and helped found the [[Shitkatapult]] record label. He is also partly responsible for the mid-2000s resurgence of the [[schaffel]] beat.
